name: The Undead Hunter
description:
You are a greedy warrior which desires more power than anything. You even gave away your arm to become stronger. Just when you thought you can't get any stronger, you heard of the being called The Undeadking, with your power to absorb the strength of fallen foes you make your way into his castle.

Since the game is still in progress there will be a lot of bugs. Please tell me if you find any of them. There is also no end screen, no tutorial and no sound expect the player footsteps. These will be added within the next month.

Controls:
  I recommend you to play with an Xbox controller but there are keyboard controls aswell.

    Controller:
        Run: left Joystick
        Jump: A-Button
        Attack: X-Button
        Dash: Y-Button (you are able to unlock the dash by finding a flying white square)
        Interact: B-Button
    
    Keyboard:
        Run: A and D
        Jump: Space
        Attack: J or Left Mouse
        Dash: LShift (you are able to unlock the dash by finding a flying white square)
        Interact: K or E
